## Color4.scaleAndAddToRef() method

Scale the current Color4 values by a factor and add the result to a given Color4

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
scaleAndAddToRef(scale: number, result: Color4): Color4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scale | <code>number</code> | defines the scale factor |
|  result | <code>Color4</code> | defines the Color4 object where to store the result |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Color4`

the unmodified current Color4
